text:
Phoebe Mary Waller-Bridge (born 14 July 1985) is an English actress and writer. She created, wrote, and starred in the Channel 4 comedy-drama series "Crashing" (2016) and the BBC comedy-drama series "Fleabag" (2016–2019).
She was also the showrunner and executive producer for the first series of the BBC America thriller series "Killing Eve" (2018–present).
